classScheduleInformation: PSYC 398 and PSYC 499 are approved for General Education credit only as a sequence. All courses must be completed to receive Advanced Composition credit.
courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Junior standing and admission to departmental honors program.
description: Seminar on experimental methods and contemporary psychological research. Prerequisite: Junior standing and admission to departmental honors program.
label: Junior Honors Seminar
